name: Prism Presets Repository
description: A curated collection of customization presets, themes, wallpapers, and tweaks for Prism.

packages.name: Ecliptic
packages.subtitle: Clean and minimal aesthetic
packages.localizedDescription: Ecliptic is a clean and minimalistic theme pack, designed exclusively for Prism.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Ecliptic is a clean and minimalistic theme pack designed exclusively for Prism. It focuses on clarity, spacing, and subtle color accents to deliver a modern system-wide experience.

versions.changeLog: Refined spacing, improved contrast, and performance optimizations

packages.name: Ecliptic Icons
packages.subtitle: Dark, clean system icons
packages.localizedDescription: A dark, clean icon theme designed to complement the Ecliptic aesthetic.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Ecliptic Icons is a carefully designed dark icon pack that pairs perfectly with the Ecliptic theme, offering consistent shapes, muted tones, and excellent contrast.

versions.changeLog: Added new app icons and improved glyph consistency

packages.name: Ecliptic Wallpapers
packages.subtitle: Glassmorphic & minimal
packages.localizedDescription: A collection of clean and glassmorphic wallpapers for Ecliptic.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Ecliptic Wallpapers delivers a set of high-resolution, glassmorphic and minimal wallpapers crafted to match the Ecliptic themeâ€™s tone and color palette.

versions.changeLog: Added 4K variants and new blur styles

packages.name: Nebula Icons
packages.subtitle: Cosmic neon icons
packages.localizedDescription: A vibrant neon icon theme inspired by deep space.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Nebula Icons brings bold neon colors and cosmic gradients to your home screen while maintaining clarity and balance.

packages.name: Aura Wallpapers
packages.subtitle: Soft gradients & light
packages.localizedDescription: Soft gradient wallpapers designed to feel light and atmospheric.
packages.localizedDescriptionLong: Aura Wallpapers focuses on subtle gradients, soft lighting, and calming color transitions, ideal for minimal setups.

versions.changeLog: Improved color banding and added warm variants
